page.title: 14CHANGES IN LERRYN & BOCONNOC
page.content: Twenty years ago there were several{shops}in{Lerryn,}now there is only one{Post Office and general {store. }Many of the houses in{Lerryn have become{holiday homes. {Ethy House}was the most important house and land owner in Lerryn but now the house is owned by the{National {Trust}and all the farms are let to tennant farmers. {Boconnoc Estate}used to employ a large workforce but now the estate is managed and run by a few key workers. The{mills}at Lerryn and Couch's Mill ceased to work many years ago although the leats which fed them are still intact.
